## VariadicValue.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `VariadicValue` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(type: VariadicType, items: TypedValue[]);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | [VariadicType](./sdk-core.variadictype.md) | the type of this TypedValue (an instance of VariadicType), not the type parameter of the VariadicType |
|  items | [TypedValue](./sdk-core.typedvalue.md)<!-- -->\[\] | the items, having the type type.getFirstTypeParameter() |
